content.html: It was truly a “White Christmas” when @ExpanseOnPrime filmed Episode 9 of Season 5. “I just wanted that look of white snow," said director @Breck_Eisner. "What I didn’t count on was it would be -34 degrees Fahrenheit…It was the coldest by far I’ve ever been.”
content.value: It was truly a “White Christmas” when @ExpanseOnPrime filmed Episode 9 of Season 5. “I just wanted that look of white snow," said director @Breck_Eisner. "What I didn’t count on was it would be -34 degrees Fahrenheit…It was the coldest by far I’ve ever been.”
